Well put rewind, there are millions of American's that have fallen into a state of absolute complacency, with a mindset of “everything will be alright….this is America. Lots of these people are on the left and the right. They watch the News (controlled by the Elite), they enjoy their 50” flat screens, mansions, swimming pools, I phones, sports cars, vacations, casinos, speed boats, and bloated pensions. They don’t care about the cost of entitlements because they have all their little toys listed above. With the National Dept growing…..a Trillion plus every year, America is either near or past the point of no return. Our Government and The Federal Reserve are playing us like fools. Once America defaults on its debt, our dollar will be devalued severely and we will be at the mercy of the New World Order. The way I look at it is this; America and its so-called leaders have two choices: Option #1: Balance the budget immediately which would probably cause a Depression. This would mean a threshold of pain for most American's to some degree or another. (It would be like starting CHEMO treatments which would make our country very sick for a decade or two). Option#2: Keep the entitlements growing and keep spending more than we take in, just keep the entitlement hog trough full, keep raising the debt ceiling, and wait for that day financial day of reckoning to come. (At that point the America “dollar” will need embalming fluid). So will our financial system. That’s where the FEMA camps will come in handy…..and the new “One World Order” will be happy to pay for that. They’ll take care of everyone.

Message.Title: If anybody hates women, it’s not the Republicans
Message.Msg: http://times-news.com/opinion/x277234233/If-anybody-hates-women-it-s-not-the-Republicans
Re election to congress is contingent on pleasing Israel, not American voters.

The Republican Party has always been a nationalist party. For nationalists the cultural element is important. Multiculturalism is tolerated only to the extent the other cultures within America, aside from the dominate one, live up to the standards of the dominate group. Support for the cultural groups and their aims does not extend beyond the borders of America, especially not to alternative nationalist identities. The J E W I S H group within America has a very high level of achievement and produces many great scientists, lawyers, and business leaders, and has proven its cultural worth by its achievements. Such a group naturally commands a great deal of influence and respect within Republican circles. However, a group of American nationalists like the Republicans is not going to support a foreign nationalist cause like Z I O N I S M While it may please I S R A E L when American nationalists attack Arab countries for their own reasons, they are not doing it to please I S R A E L and Z I O N I S T S within or outside I S R A E L The Democrat Party is not interested in nationalism at all and outright rejects the concept of superior cultures. They embrace multiculturalism precisely because of their belief in cultural equality. Because they reject nationalism outright, Democrat have no problem supporting foreign nationalist aims, such as Z I O N I S M especially when doing so earns the Democrat Party votes. That is why Truman recognized I S R A E L - to win New York. He admitted as much himself. The Democrat Party has also been known to support competing national identities within America as well. Examples include the Black P A N T H E R S the various Native American "national" causes, and more widely efforts to create hyphenated Americans wherever they can. Actively supporting a foreign national identity certainly is not problematic for them.

Message.Title: Bush = Obama = Romney
Message.Msg: It is absolute folly to think that multi-billion dollar corporate financier interests would risk their collective fate to the whims of ignorant, uninformed and essentially powerless voting masses every four years. Instead, what plays out every four years is theater designed to give the general public the illusion that they have some means of addressing their grievances without actually ever changing the balance of power in any meaningful way.
